content: As a reminder, the actions we took during the third quarter include the following: streamlining sales through our online checkout channel and eliminating test drive; optimizing our inventory mix and assortment to favor value vehicles, which have a more favorable front end GPUs and overall profitability; refocusing our physical footprint to our West Coast market, thereby, rationalizing from 10 hubs to three; reducing frontline roles in corporate positions by about 60% across remote and hub locations; and reducing corporate overhead costs.
